charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1101_0100_2:
While [Name:PlayerNickname ] was admiring
the flowers, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="himself" F="herself" ] deep in the heart of
the forest.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1101_0200_2: That was where [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] ran into Leaf and Eevee.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0300_1:
Oh hey, look who it is! What’re you doing here?
Me? I was having Eevee pick out which
flowers he wants in his next flower crown!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0400_1:
Oh, look at that red flower! The color of passion!
It totally pops and stands out!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0500_1:
Ooh! Or this black one! It’ll make you look a lot
more mature!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0600_1: Wow, you found so many, Eevee!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0700_1:
Ooh, I like this blue one, too! It’s such a nice
cool color!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0800_1:
Wow, you even found a yellow flower!
What an energetic color!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_0900_1:
Let’s see. You also found a purple flower, a pink
one, light blue... If we add the leaves, we can
make a wreath with eight colors total!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_1000_1:
Look at all these flowers you found, Eevee!
It’s like we have a small flower garden!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0301_1100_1: You’re going to use all of them?
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0401_1200_1:
Of course! With so many, there’s no need to pick
just one!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0302_1300_1: If you had to choose just one...
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0402_1400_1:
We have so many! There’s no need to choose
just one!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_1500_1:
These colors are all so distinct.
Kinda like Eevee’s Evolutions!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_1600_1:
Once Eevee is a high-enough level, do you
think we’ll have to choose how he evolves?
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_1700_1: I wonder what would be the best choice for him.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0401_1900_1: Yeah. I think that’s the best option, too!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_0402_2100_1:
I can see myself wanting to when the
time comes, but...
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2200_1:
Eevee’s future is his own.
He should be the one to choose.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2300_1:
What’s important isn’t what he chooses but how
he comes to that decision.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2400_1:
I think I can accept any outcome if it’s the choice
that Eevee makes.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2500_1:
I mean, think about it... Isn’t it wrong for
somebody else to decide your future for you?
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2600_1:
My job is to make sure that Eevee has as many
options as possible to choose from.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2700_1: At least, that’s what I think.
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2800_1:
But enough of that! Eevee gathered a bunch of
great flowers, so I’ll get to making that crown!
charaepi_ch0017_00_leaf/2301_1201_2900_1:
Right now, I can choose to use all the colors I
want, but that won’t always be the case!
Gotta enjoy it while I can!
